title: Resolve the deletion issue with duplicate UVL file names
body:
### **PR Type** Bug fix ___ ### **Description** - Fixed a critical bug in UVL file deletion where files with duplicate names were not being deleted correctly - The system now tracks and uses backend-assigned unique filenames instead of original file names for deletion operations - This ensures that the correct file instance is deleted when multiple files share the same original name - Changes are implemented in the file upload success handler and deletion request logic ___ ### **Changes walkthrough** 📝
Relevant files
Bug fix

  • Modified deletion request to send backend-assigned filename instead of

title: Add new PR label workflow
body:
### **User description** Closes #236 ___ ### **PR Type** Enhancement ___ ### **Description** Adds a new GitHub Actions workflow that automatically labels Pull Requests based on: - Branch name patterns (task/incidence) - PR title keywords (feat/fix/refactor/style/test/database/build/hotfix) - File extensions (.html/.js/.css for frontend, .py/.java/.rb for backend) Key features: - Triggers on PR open, edit, and synchronize events - Removes duplicate labels - Provides detailed console logging for debugging - Uses GitHub API to fetch changed files and apply labels ___ ### **Changes walkthrough** 📝
Relevant files
Enhancement
pr_label.yml
New GitHub Action workflow for automatic PR labeling

  • Implements a new GitHub workflow for automatic PR labeling
  • Labels are assigned based on branch name (task/incidence)
  • Labels are assigned based on PR title (feat/fix/refactor/etc)

title: Fix Publication DOI
body:
### **User description** Closes #173 ___ ### **PR Type** Bug fix, Enhancement ___ ### **Description** - Added server-side and client-side validation for the DOI format in dataset forms and scripts, ensuring it follows the pattern `10.xxxx`. - Improved error handling and logging in the dataset creation process to provide clearer feedback on failures. - Enhanced the Fakenodo service to utilize a provided `publication_doi` or generate a fake DOI if none is provided. - Fixed issues related to unsynchronized datasets by ensuring correct DOI handling and validation. ___ ### **Changes walkthrough** 📝

title: Unit and locust test for advanced search
body:
Codacy da el siguiente error: 
_Standard pseudo-random generators are not suitable for security/cryptographic purposes._

Esto se debe a que en los tests de carga Locust se han usado parámetros aleatorios con la función _random.randint()_ cuya seguridad en sistemas criptográficos no es adecuada, y se recomienda el uso de otros generadores aleatorios para las funcionalidades que lo requieran.

Al usarse estos generadores en tests de carga, se ha decidido ignorar este error de Codacy, ya que su solución llevaría más tiempo del necesario para un error realmente equívoco.

Se procede a aceptar la PR bajo estas condiciones.

title: Check OTP and reset password backend.
body:
Checks the in-session stored OTP and compares it with the user's input (which can get by checking the email). After that, it sends the user to reset their password. If both passwords are equal, it allows the change. After that, it logs the user in. The next time they log into the system it will be through the new password.

Closes #12

Workflow improvements.
body:
Improved the following workflows:

- The "**commits**" workflow to ignore commits that begin with "merge pull requests" so that merge commits do not trigger a failed response.
- The "**tests**" workflow to include, every time a pull request is made (either to build or main) an automatic comment with the coverage of the files within the modules of the project. **For this to work, a PAT must be added to the repo for every collaborator, with a repo scope, at least. If no PAT is found, the testing checks will still be performed but no comment will be published.**

Improved the following documentation:
- The **README** file to update it with the correct URL badges. It will now display the current status of the different workflows.
